programme.title: Leah's Perfect Gift
programme.desc: A Jewish Leah accompanies her boyfriend to Connecticut to experience a traditional Christmas with his family.

programme.title: Believe in Christmas
programme.desc: With no other plans for Christmas, best friends Bea and Emilia travel to Christmasland, a magical place filled with hope, holiday miracles and romance.

programme.title: The Christmas Charade
programme.desc: Facing another dull Christmas alone, sparks fly when a risk-averse librarian accidentally gets wrapped up with a grinchy FBI agent in an undercover mission to save the Heart of Christmas.

programme.title: Jingle Bell Run
programme.desc: Self-described bookworm Avery is paired with retired hockey star Wes to compete in a holiday race across America. The team struggles through themed challenges until romance runs its course.

programme.title: The Santa Summit
programme.desc: At a Santa-themed holiday event, three teachers get their groove back, strengthen their friendship and unexpectedly find love along the way.

programme.title: Christmas in Harmony
programme.desc: A music executive heads home to North Carolina to win her job back while also co-directing the church choir with her ex-boyfriend.

programme.title: A Dickens of a Holiday!
programme.desc: To mark the 100th anniversary of a Victorian festival, Cassie invites movie star and former high school classmate Jake to play Scrooge in "A Christmas Carol.".

programme.title: The Most Wonderful Time of the Year
programme.desc: A snowbound stranger (Warren Christie) brightens the holidays for a retired police officer (Henry Winkler) and his niece (Brooke Burns).

programme.title: Switched for Christmas
programme.desc: At their obligatory pre-Christmas lunch, estranged identical twins decide to swap lives up until Christmas Day.

programme.title: Falling Like Snowflakes
programme.desc: Determined to capture a rare shot of a 12-sided snowflake, a photographer enlists help from a childhood friend as they go on a mission they'll never forget.

programme.title: Christmas Next Door
programme.desc: Eric Randall, an author of bachelor lifestyle books, is left in charge of his young niece and nephew for the holidays. Unsure of himself, Eric turns to his neighbor April, a lover of all things Christmas, for help.

programme.title: On the 12th Date of Christmas
programme.desc: Two seemingly incompatible game designers in Chicago team up to create a romantic city-wide scavenger hunt to promote a hotel chain.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's Joyful Mrs. Miracle
programme.desc: Mrs. Miracle uses Christmas magic to reunite three siblings who must decide who will inherit the family's real estate empire, following their grandmother's passing.

programme.title: The Christmas Quest
programme.desc: An archeologist and her ex-husband, an expert in ancient Norse languages, are sent to Iceland at Christmastime to search for the legendary treasure of the Yule Lads.

programme.title: The Sweetest Christmas
programme.desc: A struggling pastry chef is thrilled to learn that she has made it to the finals of the American Gingerbread Competition, but distractions in her love life threaten to derail her dreams of taking home the grand prize.

programme.title: Checkin' It Twice
programme.desc: Sparks fly between a hockey player and a real estate agent after he moves into a cottage in her family's backyard.

programme.title: To Have and To Holiday
programme.desc: After a brief courtship, Celeste and Jason get engaged. Celeste then asks her pastor father, who's not ready to let his daughter go, to officiate their Christmas wedding.

programme.title: Mystic Christmas
programme.desc: A woman reconnects with the owner of a pizza shop while working at a rehabilitation center and aquarium during the holidays.

programme.title: Haul Out the Holly: Lit Up
programme.desc: Emily and Jared are looking forward to celebrating the holidays together again, this time as a couple. They're also ready to work with members of the community to make this year's Christmas festivities the best yet.

programme.title: Christmas in Evergreen: Letters to Santa
programme.desc: Lisa's trip home to Evergreen for the holidays finds her shepherding an effort to save the town's beloved general store, fulfilling the wishes of a Christmas past and finding a romance full of Christmas magic.

programme.title: Magic in Mistletoe
programme.desc: When Harrington Davis, author of the popular book series "Magic in Mistletoe," loses his holiday spirit, his publicist, April, must step in to help him save his career and find the magic again.

programme.title: Christmas Getaway
programme.desc: After a surprising breakup with her boyfriend, a travel writer decides to go on the picturesque Christmas vacation planned for the two of them, alone.

programme.title: Haul Out the Holly
programme.desc: Emily comes home to visit her parents, only to discover they're leaving for a trip of their own. While staying at their house for the holidays, Emily meets members of the community who want her to join in the neighborhood's Christmas festivities.

programme.title: A Very Vermont Christmas
programme.desc: A local champion skier and Vermont brew master teams up with an unlikely match to create a seasonal microbrew to save her family's business before Christmas.

programme.title: A '90s Christmas
programme.desc: A workaholic lawyer destined to spend Christmas alone is transported back to 1999 after an unexpected run in with a particularly wise ride-share driver.

programme.title: Deck the Walls
programme.desc: Interior designer, Rose DeMonte, uses her skills back in her hometown to renovate a Christmas Charity Home for her brother Sal and his contractor Brysen's home flipping company.

programme.title: Once Upon a Christmas Miracle
programme.desc: Told she would have less than a few months to live without a new liver, Heather's time was running out when a kind stranger heard of her plight and discovered he was a perfect match. The two met and before long a friendship developed into romance.

programme.title: A Blue Ridge Mountain Christmas
programme.desc: Hotel manager Willow returns to her stunning Virginia hometown to help her sister plan a Christmas wedding at the inn her family once owned.

programme.title: Making Spirits Bright
programme.desc: A man and a woman from rival families try to mend their respective fathers' decades-old feud. They soon find romance along the way as they compete in a holiday decorating contest.

programme.title: The Gift of Peace
programme.desc: Traci is a once-devout Christian who stopped believing in God after her husband tragically died despite her prayers. As her second Christmas without him approaches, she tries going to a support group for inspiration and comfort.

programme.title: Sugar Plum Twist
programme.desc: After failing to get the coveted role of the Sugar Plum Fairy in "The Nutcracker," an aspiring ballerina joins forces with a retiree from the New York City Ballet to create her own dance spectacular -- with a Latin twist.

programme.title: Two Turtle Doves
programme.desc: Dr. Sharon Hayes returns home to search for a beloved family heirloom. With the help of an adorable little girl and her dispirited father, together they rediscover the magic of Christmas.

programme.title: A Heavenly Christmas
programme.desc: A workaholic's (Kristin Davis) untimely death leads to her recruitment as a Christmas angel. Her first task is to help a struggling singer (Eric McCormack) use his music to heal old wounds.

programme.title: Debbie Macomber's A Mrs. Miracle Christmas
programme.desc: When members of a family face loneliness and lose faith, Mrs. Miracle swoops in to renew their Christmas spirit.

programme.title: Christmas Wonderland
programme.desc: Heidi returns home to watch her niece and nephew and comes face to face with her high school love. Heidi offers to help him with a dance, and the more time she spends decorating, the more she finds herself inspired to start painting again.

programme.title: Five Star Christmas
programme.desc: After moving back to her hometown, a woman plots with her siblings and grandparents to help her father's new bed and breakfast get a five-star review from an incognito travel critic.

programme.title: A Season for Family
programme.desc: Maddy's adopted son, Wesley, has just one wish for Christmas -- to meet his brother, Cody, who was adopted into a different family. Circumstances soon bring the two siblings together while sparks fly between their respective parents.

programme.title: Family for Christmas
programme.desc: After an offhand wish to a man playing Santa Claus, a woman wakes up to find herself married to her college sweetheart.

programme.title: Christmas Under the Stars
programme.desc: Nick loses his high finance job right before Christmas. Lost, he takes a gig at a tree lot, where he meets Julie and her son, Matt.

programme.title: Christmas at Grand Valley
programme.desc: Kelly returns to Grand Valley for Christmas. When Leo, a single dad, arrives in town with his kids to review a hotel, the two cross paths. As Kelly re-experiences traditions with Leo, she begins to find her way back to her passion for art.

programme.title: A Maple Valley Christmas
programme.desc: Erica is a rancher who's spent her whole life working the family farm with her mother and sister. When Aaron arrives and disrupts her plans, she starts to question what it is she actually wants.

programme.title: Chateau Christmas
programme.desc: A world-renowned pianist rediscovers her passion for music after reuniting with her ex during the holidays.

programme.title: The Holiday Stocking
programme.desc: A new angel gets the chance to address his one regret -- that he didn't help his sisters reconcile while he was still alive. Returning to Earth as a stranger, he gets each of them to revive their parents' old tradition of encouraging charity.

programme.title: The Christmas Bow
programme.desc: When an accident puts her music dreams on hold, a gifted violinist reconnects with an old family friend, who helps her heal and find love during the holidays.

programme.title: A Christmas Duet
programme.desc: Fate brings an ex-music duo together over the holidays, just in time for the annual Yuletide Festival.

programme.title: A Song for Christmas
programme.desc: A pop star becomes stranded in a small town in the dead of winter and finds refuge at a family's beleaguered dairy farm.

programme.title: Our Christmas Love Song
programme.desc: When country star Melody Jones is accused of plagiarizing her holiday single, she returns home to spend Christmas with her estranged family and old flame and learns what is important in life.

programme.title: My Sweet Austrian Holiday
programme.desc: Charlotte inherits a chocolate shop from her grandparents but soon finds herself in a battle with a large developer who wants to buy the building to turn it into an exclusive shopping boutique.

programme.title: Mystery on Mistletoe Lane
programme.desc: New to town, Heidi Wicks and her kids discover a Christmas mystery in their historic home. Local handyman and historian David helps along the way, finding his own surprising connection.

programme.title: This Time Each Year
programme.desc: Despite a trial separation, Lauren pretends to still be with her husband, Kevin, to placate her overbearing mother. The ruse may be just what the couple needs to finally work on their marriage.

programme.title: A Godwink Christmas: Second Chance, First Love
programme.desc: After 15 years, a single father moves home from Hawaii with his two sons and, through a series of coincidences -- or Godwinks, ends up stuck in traffic next to his high school sweetheart.

programme.title: Long Lost Christmas

programme.desc: Emisija Sport & Tech Lifestyle vodi vas kroz svet najnovijih lifestyle i tehnologija u sportu.

programme.title: Košarka - Euroleague: Partizan - Panathinaikos
programme.desc: Najjače klupsko takmičenje u košarci na području Evrope svake sezone privlači pažnju velikog broja zaljubljenika košarku. Kao takmičenje visokog kvaliteta verujemo da će privući vašu pažnju.

programme.title: Magazin saudijske lige
programme.desc: Donosimo pregled mečeva saudijske fudbalske lige, najbolji golovi, potezi i analize.

programme.title: Košarka - Eurocup: Hamburg - Valencia
programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke.

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal: SEC Finale: Texas - Georgia
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.title: Pregled španske košarke
programme.desc: Donosimo pregled mečeva i klipove najboljih trenutaka iz Endese, najjače košarkaške lige Španije.

programme.title: Košarka - Eurocup: Turk Telekom - Aris
programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke. (LIVE).

programme.title: Put do vrha
programme.desc: Neverovatne priče o usponu tamnoputih sportista do samog vrha: Između ostalih, Lebron Džejms i Serena Vilijams...

programme.title: Košarka - Eurocup: Venezia - Cedevita Olimpija
programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke. (LIVE).

programme.title: Koledž košarka: Arkansas - Michigan
programme.desc: NCAA je najpoznatiji košarkaški turnir univerziteta na svetu! Obavezno i ovog proleća pratite ko će biti najbolja univerzitetska ekipa u SAD-u i koje će možda buduće NBA zvezde zablistati.

programme.title: Košarka - Eurocup: Besiktas - Bahcesehir
programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke.

programme.title: Uži izbor
programme.desc: Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste. Neko će probati ono o čemu se decenijama priča...

programme.title: Fudbal - Portugalska liga: Estrela Amadora - Arouca
programme.desc: Prvi liga portugalskog fudbala, Primeira liga, osnovana je 1934. i broji 18 klubova. Najviše osvojenih titula prvaka ima lisabonski gigant Benfika.

programme.title: Fudbal - 3. Bundesliga: Hansa - Sandhausen
programme.desc: Neki nekadašnji šampioni Nemačke su ovde. Ulazak u Cvajtu znači mnogo slave i novca, ali dug je i naporan put do cilja.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bugarska liga: Lokomotiv Sofia - Septemvri
programme.desc: Od 1948. godine bugarski klubovi bore se za titulu najboljeg u zemlji. Trenutno u ligi nastupa 14 klubova, koji se bore za prvo mesto i nastup u kvalifikacijama Lige šampiona.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga 2: Regensburg - Koln
programme.desc: Popularna "Cvajta" čini se, nikada nije bila jača. Ko će se od velikana vratiti u prvu ligu? Mesta je malo a kandidata mnogo.

programme.title: Fudbal - Grčka liga: Asteras - Panathinaikos
programme.desc: Voli se fudbal u Grčkoj i svaki duel, pogotovo derbi, doživljava se sa mnogo strasti. Olimpijakos jeste favorit za titulu, ali AEK, PAOK i večiti rival Panatinaikos kucaju na vrata...

programme.title: Fudbal - Turska liga: Basaksehir - Hatay
programme.desc: Turska Superliga je najviša profesionalna liga Turske u fudbalu. Ova liga osnovana je 1957. godine.

programme.title: Rivalitet legendi
programme.desc: Vukli su jedni druge napred, uvek je neki rivalitet izdizao sport na lestvicu više. Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova.

programme.title: Američki koledž fudbal: SEC Finale: Texas - Georgia
programme.desc: Koledž fudbal je američki fudbal koji igraju timovi sportista-studenata u okviru američkih koledža, univerziteta i vojnih akademija. Univerzitetski fudbal je jedna stepenica niže u odnosu na...

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga: Monchegladbach - Dortmund
programme.desc: Fudbalska Bundesliga najviši je rang takmičenje u Nemačkoj koja od 1963. godine i svog osnutka visokom kvalitetom igre oduševljava sve fudbalske poklonike širom sveta.

programme.title: Košarka - Izraelska liga: Maccabi - Hapoel Haifa
programme.desc: Superliga Izraela u košarci je najviši rang košarkaških takmičenja u Izraelu. Liga je osnovana 1954. godine i trenutno broji 12 klubova. (LIVE).

programme.title: MUTV: Manchester United - Nottingham Forest (PL)
programme.desc: Donosimo vam najnovije vesti i reportaže iz "Mančester junajteda", kluba velike tradicije i reputacije. Klub je osnovan 1878. godine i tokom decenija je iznedrio velike fudbalske zvezde.

programme.title: WRC_ Pregled: Pregled sezone
programme.desc: Donosimo vam snimke najboljih trenutaka sa FIA svetskog reli šampionata, preglede trka i intervjue sa takmičarima.

programme.title: Omaž zvezdama
programme.desc: Bokseri, fudbaleri, košarkaši... Najbolji sportisti svih vremena, iz svih sportova. Na istom mestu, u isto vreme, kako ih uporediti i kako napraviti večne liste.

programme.desc: Drugo po težini takmičenje u evropskoj klubskoj košarci sigurno zavređuje pažnju ljubitelja košarke. Iako je pomalo u senci Evrolige, Evrokup nudi obilje iznenađenja i kvalitetne košarke.

programme.title: Fudbal - 3. Bundesliga: Rot-Weiss - Munchen 1860
programme.desc: Neki nekadašnji šampioni Nemačke su ovde. Ulazak u Cvajtu znači mnogo slave i novca, ali dug je i naporan put do cilja.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bugarska 2. liga: Minyor - Etar
programme.desc: Pratite Drugu bugarsku ligu u kojoj se takmiči šesnaest klubova. Reč je o drugom nivou fudbalskog takmičenja u bugarskom ligaškom sistemu.

programme.title: Fudbal (Ž) Koledž prvenstvo: Finale: Wake Forest - North Carolina
programme.desc: Pratite uzbudljivo nadmetanje na kom snage odmeravaju fudbalerke američkih koledža. Takmičenje se održava od 1982. godine, a ubedljivo najviše pobeda u dosadašnjim izdanjima ima tim koji dolazi iz...

programme.title: Pregled holandske lige
programme.desc: Očekuje se trka Ajaksa i PSV-a za titulu. Može li Fejenord da im se priključi ili će AZ Alkmar napasti iz senke?

programme.title: Pregled portugalske lige
programme.desc: Osnovana 1934. kao probni projekat, portugalska liga je četiri godine kasnije dobila i svoju službenu verziju nazvanu Primeira. U današnjem sistemu liga broji 18 ekipa gde svaka ekipa igra po jednu...

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga 2: Fortuna - Braunschweig
programme.desc: Popularna "Cvajta" čini se, nikada nije bila jača. Ko će se od velikana vratiti u prvu ligu? Mesta je malo a kandidata mnogo.

programme.title: Fudbal - Bundesliga: Kiel - Leipzig

programme.title: Pregled turske lige
programme.desc: Bešiktaš može da se hvali šampionskom titulom, ali Trabzon, Galatasaraj i Fenerbahče su se ozbiljno pojačali i svi misle da mogu do trofeja. Čini se da će biti napeto do poslednjeg kola.

programme.title: Pregled Bundeslige
programme.desc: Uz sve ono što nam je Nemačka podarila kroz istoriju ponosno stoji i Bundesliga. Najviši rang fudbalskog takmičenja osnovanog 1963. godine broji 18 ekipa koje svakog avgusta kreću u trku za popularnim...

programme.title: Pregled Jedrenje: Vendee Globe
programme.desc: Vendée Globe je jedna od najzahtevnijih regata za jedriličare na svetu. U ovom takmičenju jedriličari su sami na svojim plovilima u trci oko sveta.
